value.title: AI startup Cohere, now valued at over $2.1B, raises $270M
value.excerpt: Cohere, a generative AI startup with ties to Google, has raised $270 million in a round that values the company at over $2.1 billion.

value.title: Another US judge says lawyers must disclose AI use
value.excerpt: A judge on the U.S. Court of International Trade on Thursday issued an order requiring lawyers to disclose their use of generative artificial intelligence tools to create legal documents, citing security concerns related to confidential information.

value.title: UK’s plans for “first global summit” on AI safety draw criticism

value.title: Google Cloud and Salesforce partner to help improve customer experience with AI
value.excerpt: The two companies are coming together to analyze data with AI and help businesses create ads customers probably want to see.

value.title: Qualcomm May Be a Hidden AI Winner, Says Analyst. Smartphone Chips Are Why.
value.excerpt: TD Cowen analyst Matthew Ramsay says chips within phones, such as those the company makes, could handle some of the processing for AI queries.

value.title: DeSantis ad uses fake AI images of Trump hugging and kissing Fauci, experts say
value.excerpt: A Ron DeSantis presidential campaign video shows three pictures of Donald Trump hugging and kissing Anthony Fauci, all of which seem to be fake images generated by artificial intelligence. One professor told Ars today that there is "no doubt" the ad uses fake AI images.

value.title: How Nvidia uses GPT-4 to make AI better at Minecraft
value.excerpt: The Voyager program can both devise new challenges in the game, and then continuously refine strategies for success. Sometimes it hallucinates non-existent items, though, such as an "acacia axe."

value.title: Introducing popularity tuning for Similar-Items in Amazon Personalize
value.excerpt: Amazon Personalize now enables popularity tuning for its Similar-Items recipe (aws-similar-items). Similar-Items generates recommendations that are similar to the item that a user selects, helping users discover new items in your catalog based on the previous behavior of all users and item metadata.

value.title: Introducing Google’s Secure AI Framework
value.excerpt: Today Google released released the Secure AI Framework to help collaboratively secure AI technology.

value.title: Nvidia’s new AI “Superchip” combines CPU and GPU to train monster AI systems
value.excerpt: Early last week at COMPUTEX, Nvidia announced that its new GH200  "Superchip"—a combination CPU and GPU specifically created for large-scale AI applications—has entered full production. It's a beast.
